snippet: The victim, Abbas Behnam-Bakhsh of Staten Island, died after a 15-foot length of pipe fell from a forklift as it was being unloaded from a truck, the authorities said.
lead_paragraph: The victim, Abbas Behnam-Bakhsh of Staten Island, died after a 15-foot length of pipe fell from a forklift as it was being unloaded from a truck, the authorities said.

headline.main: Staten Island Man, 55, Is Killed by a Falling 15-Foot Pipe
headline.print_headline: Staten Island Man, 55, Is Killed by a Falling 15-Foot Pipe
